CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 2 , the maximum absorption peak of PQCDTB ( λ max ) was observed at 389 and 539 nm , respectively , in solution ( 10^-6 M in chloroform ).

Let's think step by step.
1. PQCDTB: This is the name of the material or compound that is being discussed in the paragraph. The "PQCDTB" is the Material Name entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 2 , the maximum absorption peak of PQCDTB ( λ max ) was observed at 389 and 539 nm , respectively , in solution ( 10^-6 M in chloroform ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Figure 2: This is not a property value, but rather a reference to a figure.
2. Maximum absorption peak: This is a property of PQCDTB.
3. λ max : This is a property value representing the wavelength of the maximum absorption peak for PQCDTB.
4. 389 nm: This is a property value representing the wavelength of one maximum absorption peak.
5. 539 nm: This is a property value representing the wavelength of the other maximum absorption peak.
6. 10^-6 M: This is a property value representing the concentration of PQCDTB in the solution.
7. Chloroform: This is not a property value, but rather the name of the solvent in which the solution is prepared.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. λ max : This is a property value representing the wavelength of the maximum absorption peak for PQCDTB.
2. 389 nm: This is a property value representing the wavelength of one maximum absorption peak.
3. 539 nm: This is a property value representing the wavelength of the other maximum absorption peak.
4. 10^-6 M: This is a property value representing the concentration of PQCDTB in the solution.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Maximum absorption peak wavelength of PQCDTB (λ max) at 389 nm |
| Maximum absorption peak wavelength of PQCDTB (λ max) at 539 nm |
| Concentration of PQCDTB in solution (10^-6 M) |
